title: A Desert Counting Book
description: Bailey is a dog who lives in Arizona. She likes many animals and plants that live in the desert. Students will have the opportunity to count Bailey's favorite things found in the desert. This text provides students with the opportunity to summarize and classify information. Detailed, supportive illustrations and repetitive phrases support early readers.
